channel.title: Pages on No Sense
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on No Sense

item.title: About
item.description:
No Sense - Some of my stupid thoughts

This site is about things I’m interested in. It is a kind of notebook for some of my stupid thoughts.

The content might not be of interest to anyone else.

Short summary of this license: CC BY 4.0 Deed.
